verses.verse: And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1096><s%> It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As Was <S%G1511><s%> He <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> A Place <S%G5117><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> Praying, <S%G4336><s%> When <S%G5613><s%> He Ceased, <S%G3973><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> One <S%G5100><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> Of His Disciples <S%G846><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> Teach <S%G1321><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To Pray, <S%G4336><s%> As <S%G2531><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> John <S%G2491><s%> Taught <S%G1321><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3101><s%> His Disciples. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G2036><s%> And He Said <S%G1161><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> Ye Pray <S%G4336><s%> Say, <S%G3004><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Our, <S%G2257><s%> Who Art <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> , Heavens, <S%G3772><s%> Sanctified Be <S%G37><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3686><s%> Thy Name; <S%G4675><s%> Let Come <S%G2064><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> Thy Kingdom; <S%G4675><s%> Let Be Done <S%G1096><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2307><s%> Thy Will, <S%G4675><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> , Heaven, So <S%G3772><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Earth. <S%G1093><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Forgive <S%G863><s%> Us <S%G2254><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G266><s%> Our Sins, <S%G2257><s%> <S%G2532><s%> For Also <S%G1063><s%> Ourselves <S%G846><s%> We Forgive <S%G863><s%> Every One <S%G3956><s%> Indebted <S%G3784><s%> To Us; <S%G2254><s%> <S%G2532><s%> And <S%G3361><s%> Lead Not <S%G1533><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Temptation, <S%G3986><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Deliver <S%G4506><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> From <S%G575><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Evil. <S%G4190><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Said <S%G2036><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Who <S%G5101><s%> Among <S%G1537><s%> You <S%G5216><s%> Shall Have <S%G2192><s%> A Friend, <S%G5384><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Go <S%G4198><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> At Midnight, <S%G3317><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Say <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Friend, <S%G5384><s%> Lend <S%G5531><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> Three <S%G5140><s%> Loaves, <S%G740><s%>

Since <S%G1894><s%> A Friend <S%G5384><s%> Of Mine <S%G3450><s%> Is Come <S%G3854><s%> Off <S%G1537><s%> A Journey <S%G3598><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Me, <S%G3165><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Have Not <S%G2192><s%> What <S%G3739><s%> I Shall Set Before <S%G3908><s%> Him; <S%G846><s%>

And He <S%G2548><s%> From Within <S%G2081><s%> Answering <S%G611><s%> Should Say, <S%G2036><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Me <S%G3427><s%> Trouble <S%G2873><s%> Cause; <S%G3930><s%> Already <S%G2235><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Door <S%G2374><s%> Has Been Shut, <S%G2808><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3813><s%> My Children <S%G3450><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Bed <S%G2845><s%> Are; <S%G1526><s%> <S%G3756><s%> I Cannot <S%G1410><s%> Rise Up <S%G450><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> To Thee. <S%G4671><s%>

I Say <S%G3004><s%> To You, <S%G5213><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Even <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> He Will Give <S%G1325><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Having Risen Up, <S%G450><s%> Because Of His <S%G1223><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Being <S%G1511><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Friend, <S%G5384><s%> <S%G1223><s%> Yet Because Of <S%G1065><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G335><s%> His Importunity <S%G846><s%> Having Risen <S%G1453><s%> He Will Give <S%G1325><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> As Many As <S%G3745><s%> He Needs. <S%G5535><s%>

And I 2504 P-1NS-C To You 5213 P-2DP Say, 3004 V-PAI-1S Ask, 154 V-PAM-2P And 2532 CONJ It Shall Be Given 1325 V-FPI-3S To You; 5213 P-2DP Seek, 2212 V-PAM-2P And 2532 CONJ Ye Shall Find; 2147 V-FAI-2P Knock, 2925 V-PAM-2P And 2532 CONJ It Shall Be Opened 455 V-2FPI-3S To You. 5213 P-2DP

<S%G3956><s%> For Every One <S%G1063><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Asks <S%G154><s%> Receives; <S%G2983><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> He That <S%G3588><s%> Seeks <S%G2212><s%> Finds; <S%G2147><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> To Him That <S%G3588><s%> Knocks <S%G2925><s%> It Will Be Opened. <S%G455><s%>

<S%G5101><s%> And Which <S%G1161><s%> Of You <S%G5216><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> A Father <S%G3962><s%> Shall Ask For <S%G154><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> , <S%G740><s%> Bread, <S%G3361><s%> A Stone <S%G3037><s%> Will He Give <S%G1929><s%> To Him? <S%G846><s%> If <S%G1487><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2486><s%> A Fish, <S%G3361><s%> Instead Of <S%G473><s%> A Fish <S%G2486><s%> A Serpent <S%G3789><s%> Will He Give <S%G1929><s%> To Him? <S%G846><s%>
Or <S%G2228><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> If <S%G1437><s%> He Should Ask <S%G154><s%> <S%G5609><s%> An Egg, <S%G3361><s%> Will He Give <S%G1929><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> A Scorpion? <S%G4651><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Ye, <S%G5210><s%> Evil <S%G4190><s%> Being, <S%G5225><s%> Know How <S%G1492><s%> Good <S%G18><s%> Gifts <S%G1390><s%> To Give <S%G1325><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> To Your Children, <S%G5216><s%> How Much <S%G4214><s%> More <S%G3123><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Father <S%G3962><s%> Who Is <S%G3588><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Heaven <S%G3772><s%> Will Give The <S%G1325><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Holy <S%G40><s%> To Those That <S%G3588><s%> Ask <S%G154><s%> Him? <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> He Was <S%G2258><s%> Casting Out <S%G1544><s%> A Demon, <S%G1140><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> It <S%G846><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> Dumb; <S%G2974><s%> <S%G1096><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> On The Demon <S%G1140><s%> Having Gone Out, <S%G1831><s%> Spoke <S%G2980><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dumb. <S%G2974><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowds. <S%G3793><s%>

<S%G5100><s%> But Some <S%G1161><s%> Of <S%G1537><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> Prince <S%G758><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Demons <S%G1140><s%> He Casts Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons. <S%G1140><s%>
<S%G2087><s%> And Others, <S%G1161><s%> Tempting, <S%G3985><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> ' From <S%G3844><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> Were Seeking <S%G2212><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> Heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

<S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Thoughts <S%G1270><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Them, <S%G846><s%> Every <S%G3956><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Itself <S%G1438><s%> Divided <S%G1266><s%> Is Brought To Desolation; <S%G2049><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> Against <S%G1909><s%> A House <S%G3624><s%> Falls. <S%G4098><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> ' Against <S%G1909><s%> Himself <S%G1438><s%> Be Divided, <S%G1266><s%> How <S%G4459><s%> Shall Stand <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G932><s%> His Kingdom? <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> Ye Say, <S%G3004><s%> By <S%G1722><s%> Beelzebub <S%G954><s%> <S%G1544><s%> I Cast Out <S%G3165><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons. <S%G1140><s%>

<S%G1487><s%> And If <S%G1161><s%> I 1473 P-1NS By 1722 PREP Beelzebub 954 N-PRI Cast Out 1544 V-PAI-1S The 3588 T-APN Demons, 1140 N-APN 3588 T-NPM 5207 N-NPM Your Sons 5216 P-2GP By 1722 PREP Whom 5101 I-DSM Do They Cast Out? 1544 V-PAI-3P On Account Of 1223 PREP This 5124 D-ASN Judges 2923 N-NPM Of You 5216 P-2GP They 846 P-NPM Shall Be. 2071 V-FXI-3P

<S%G1487><s%> But If <S%G1161><s%> By The <S%G1722><s%> Finger <S%G1147><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> I Cast Out <S%G1544><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Demons, <S%G1140><s%> Then <S%G686><s%> Is Come <S%G5348><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Kingdom <S%G932><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God. <S%G2316><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Strong Man <S%G2478><s%> Being Armed <S%G2528><s%> May Keep <S%G5442><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1438><s%> His Own Dwelling, <S%G833><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Are <S%G2076><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5224><s%> His Goods; <S%G846><s%>

<S%G1875><s%> But As Soon As <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Stronger <S%G2478><s%> Than He <S%G846><s%> Coming Upon Him <S%G1904><s%> Shall Overcome <S%G3528><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Panoply <S%G3833><s%> His <S%G846><s%> He Takes Away <S%G142><s%> ' In <S%G1909><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> He Had Trusted, <S%G3982><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G4661><s%> His Spoils <S%G846><s%> He Divides. <S%G1239><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> He <S%G3361><s%> That Is Not <S%G5607><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> ' Against <S%G2596><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Is, <S%G2076><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> He That <S%G3361><s%> Gathers Not <S%G4863><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Me <S%G1700><s%> Scatters. <S%G4650><s%>

When <S%G3752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unclean <S%G169><s%> Spirit <S%G4151><s%> Is Gone Out <S%G1831><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Man, <S%G444><s%> He Goes <S%G1330><s%> ' Through <S%G1223><s%> Dry <S%G504><s%> Places, <S%G5117><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> Rest; <S%G372><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Finding Any <S%G2147><s%> He Says, <S%G3004><s%> I Will Return <S%G5290><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3624><s%> My House <S%G3450><s%> Whence <S%G3606><s%> I Came Out. <S%G1831><s%>
And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He Finds It <S%G2147><s%> Swept <S%G4563><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Adorned. <S%G2885><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> He Goes <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Takes <S%G3880><s%> Seven <S%G2033><s%> Other <S%G2087><s%> Spirits <S%G4151><s%> More Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Than Himself, <S%G1438><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Entered <S%G1525><s%> They Dwell <S%G2730><s%> There; <S%G1563><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Becomes <S%G1096><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Last <S%G2078><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Man <S%G444><s%> Of That <S%G1565><s%> Worse <S%G5501><s%> Than The <S%G3588><s%> First. <S%G4413><s%>

<S%G1096><s%> <S%G1161><s%> And It Came To Pass <S%G1722><s%> <S%G3588><s%> As Spoke <S%G3004><s%> He <S%G846><s%> These Things, <S%G5023><s%> Lifting Up <S%G1869><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> A Woman Her <S%G1135><s%> Voice <S%G5456><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Crowd <S%G3793><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Womb <S%G2836><s%> That <S%G3588><s%> Bore <S%G941><s%> Thee, <S%G4571><s%> And The <S%G2532><s%> Breasts <S%G3149><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Thou Didst Suck. <S%G2337><s%>

<S%G846><s%> But He <S%G1161><s%> Said, <S%G2036><s%> Yea Rather <S%G3304><s%> Blessed <S%G3107><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Word <S%G3056><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God <S%G2316><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Keep <S%G5442><s%> It. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Crowds <S%G3793><s%> Being Thronged Together <S%G1865><s%> He Began <S%G756><s%> To Say, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Generation <S%G1074><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> Wicked <S%G4190><s%> Is; <S%G2076><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> , It Seeks After, <S%G1934><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Shall Be Given <S%G1325><s%> <S%G846><s%> To It <S%G1487><s%> Except <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Sign <S%G4592><s%> Of Jonah <S%G2495><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet. <S%G4396><s%>

<S%G2531><s%> For As <S%G1063><s%> Was <S%G1096><s%> Jonah <S%G2495><s%> A Sign <S%G4592><s%> To The <S%G3588><s%> Ninevites, <S%G3536><s%> Thus <S%G3779><s%> Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Son <S%G5207><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Man <S%G444><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> To This Generation. <S%G3778><s%>

A Queen <S%G938><s%> Of The South <S%G3558><s%> Shall Rise Up <S%G1453><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Men <S%G435><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> Of This Generation, <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Condemn <S%G2632><s%> Them; <S%G846><s%> For <S%G3754><s%> She Came <S%G2064><s%> From <S%G1537><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ends <S%G4009><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Earth <S%G1093><s%> To Hear <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Wisdom <S%G4678><s%> , Of Solomon, <S%G4672><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Than Solomon <S%G4672><s%> Here. <S%G5602><s%>

Men <S%G435><s%> Of Nineveh <S%G3535><s%> Shall Stand Up <S%G450><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Judgment <S%G2920><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1074><s%> This Generation <S%G3778><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Shall Condemn <S%G2632><s%> It, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They Repented <S%G3340><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Proclamation <S%G2782><s%> Of Jonah : <S%G2495><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> , Behold, <S%G2400><s%> More <S%G4119><s%> Than Jonah <S%G2495><s%> Here. <S%G5602><s%>

<S%G3762><s%> But No One <S%G1161><s%> A Lamp <S%G3088><s%> Having Lit <S%G681><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Secret <S%G2927><s%> Sets It, <S%G5087><s%> Nor <S%G3761><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Corn Measure, <S%G3426><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Upon <S%G1909><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lampstand, <S%G3087><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> They Who <S%G3588><s%> Enter In <S%G1531><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5338><s%> May See. <S%G991><s%>
See <S%G4648><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Lest <S%G3361><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Light <S%G5457><s%> That Is <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Thee <S%G4671><s%> Darkness <S%G4655><s%> Is. <S%G2076><s%>

If <S%G1487><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Body <S%G4983><s%> Thy <S%G4675><s%> Whole Is <S%G3650><s%> Light, <S%G5460><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> Having <S%G2192><s%> Any <S%G5100><s%> Part <S%G3313><s%> Dark, <S%G4652><s%> It Shall Be <S%G2071><s%> Light <S%G5460><s%> All, <S%G3650><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lamp <S%G3088><s%> <S%G3588><s%> With Its Brightness <S%G796><s%> May Light <S%G5461><s%> Thee. <S%G4571><s%>

<S%G1722><s%> <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Now As Was Speaking He <S%G2980><s%> Asked <S%G2065><s%> Him <S%G846><s%> A Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> Certain <S%G5100><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> He Would Dine <S%G709><s%> ' With <S%G3844><s%> Him : <S%G846><s%> <S%G1525><s%> And Having Entered <S%G1161><s%> He Reclined Himself. <S%G377><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> Pharisee <S%G5330><s%> Seeing It <S%G1492><s%> Wondered <S%G2296><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> First <S%G4412><s%> He Washed <S%G907><s%> Before <S%G4253><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Dinner. <S%G712><s%>
